title: Quiz
description: A quiz for a health sciences course built with React and Redux. Based on specifications laid out as an interview question here.

title: Street Cleaning Slack Bot
description: A Slack bot that alerts a channel on street cleaning days and responds to mentions. Intended to help avoid parking tickets.

title: Spotify Search
description: A simple search page that utilizes Spotify's open search API to search for artists, albums, and tracks. Built with ES6 and React. Note: Spotify has since added auth to this search endpoint and this project no longer functions
